QuestData.Title: Revered Among Honor Hold
QuestData.Description: You've proven your worth to our cause, $n. One such as yourself could one day become a great leader.$B$BContinue to fight our enemies in the Shattered Halls and gain renown among my men. If you live up to my expectations I will have greater tasks to ask of you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Force Commander Danath Trollbane at Honor Hold in Hellfire Peninsula wants you to become revered with Honor Hold by fighting Fel Orcs inside the Shattered Halls of Hellfire Citadel.
